title: Stage Lv6-P3-S19
description: Level 6 grammar practice focusing on stage-specific patterns and expressions.
examples: I wish I had more time for this project.
If only I hadn't said that in the meeting.
learning_points: Level 6 target grammar and expressions with practical usage examples

sentences.kr: 이 프로젝트에 더 많은 시간이 있으면 좋겠습니다.
sentences.en: I wish I had more time for this project.

sentences.kr: 회의에서 그런 말을 하지 말았더라면 좋았을 텐데요.
sentences.en: If only I hadn't said that in the meeting.

sentences.kr: 회사가 직원 개발에 더 투자하면 좋겠습니다.
sentences.en: I wish the company would invest more in employee development.
If only we had started earlier.
I wish communication were more effective.

sentences.kr: 그 결정을 다시 생각해봤더라면 좋았을 텐데요.
sentences.en: If only I had reconsidered that decision.
I wish we had a larger budget.

sentences.kr: 고객의 요구사항을 미리 파악했더라면 좋았을 텐데요.
sentences.en: If only we had understood the client's requirements beforehand.
